entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Varennes
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
